# hasiCloudAccount

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the user has an iCloud account.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasiCloudAccount: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the user identity has an iCloud account; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Accessing iCloud Information

- **lookupInfo**: The lookup info for retrieving the user identity.
- **CKUserIdentity.LookupInfo**: The criteria to use when searching for discoverable iCloud users.
